definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: Older women already predominate on organized sightseeing tours.
sentences.chinese: 年長的女性在各種觀光旅遊團中已佔大多數。

sentences.english: Just 65 tickets are available for the official tour package backed by the Japan Football Association.
sentences.chinese: 日本足球協會組織的官方旅遊團只有65張球票。

sentences.english: Tour leaders can now enter the visa hall with tour groups from their agency for the visa interview.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊團領隊現在可以進入簽證處協助其團員進行面籤。

sentences.english: The group groused about the service in the hotel .
sentences.chinese: 旅遊團對這家飯店的服務質量抱怨頗多。

sentences.english: The group have been alloted 50 rooms in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 這家飯店給旅遊團分配了50間客房。

sentences.english: What should the tour guides do before the arriving of the tourist group?
sentences.chinese: 第五題旅遊團抵達前導遊員應當做好哪些工作？

sentences.english: What should the tour guide do when the tourist group arrives?
sentences.chinese: 第六題旅遊團抵達後導遊員應當做好哪些工作？

sentences.english: How to recognize the tour groups as a local guide ?
sentences.chinese: 作爲地陪應如何認找旅遊團？

sentences.english: The party were allocated room in the hotel annexe .
sentences.chinese: 旅遊團的成員被分配到飯店的輔樓下榻。

sentences.english: The tour leader will be wearing a red armband.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊團的劣謨將在胳膊上佩戴紅色臂章。

sentences.english: Our tour group is interested in obtaining a bulk fare.
sentences.chinese: 我們的旅遊團想購買團體票。

sentences.english: The racket involved the practice of allowing tour groups to bypass the ticket lines.
sentences.chinese: 其中涉及到博物院允許旅遊團繞過檢票口這種做法。

sentences.english: The Chinese tourists were also prohibited from leaving their chaperoned groups.
sentences.chinese: 中國遊客亦不得離開受監護的旅遊團。
我想參加全天的旅遊團。

sentences.english: Have you go to travel with the Shanghai travel busniess in America?
sentences.chinese: 你在美國沒有去上海的旅遊團嗎？

sentences.english: In the fall of that year, the couple went on a package tour together with a group to Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 那一年的秋天，老兩口跟旅遊團去了雲南。

definition: lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
jointing machine/riveter/welder/sealer/to meet a plane (i.e. to meet sb at airport)/to service a plane (of airport workers)
to ride (in a vehicle)/to get a lift/to hitch-hike
